casebody.data:
Jacek I. SMIGELSKI, petitioner,
v.
Ellen Ash PETERS, et al. No. 14-6261. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 17, 2014.

Opinion

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until December 8, 2014, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of Rules of this Court.
